name: Color Tap Mania Puzzle
description:
Remove the blocks of the same color to get points and clear the screen. Easy to learn hard to master!

Each level is a unique mix of colored blocks puzzles. This game is reinventing the old classics in a beautiful and elegant way!

Gameplay is surprisingly simple but so deep!

NO ADS, NO IAP. BRAINS ONLY

Features:
►One Tap Controls
►Quick but Challenging Levels
►Rich Graphics
►Fluid liquid physics of blocks!
►Satisfying gameplay
►Optimized Battery Consumption
►Thousands of levels

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
